title: Episode #1.1
episode_desc: Thomas Shelby plans to fix a horse race; some guns turn up stolen.
show_desc: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.
